name: 2023 3rd International Conference on Power Electronics and Control Engineering
content: PUBLICATION: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by the conference scientific committees and journal, and accepted papers will be published in either of the journals below based on their topics: ✿ Journal of Automation and Control Engineering (ISSN: 2301-3702 (Print )) Abstract and Index: Google Scholar, Crossref, EBSCO and etc. ✿ International Journal of Electronics and Electrical Engineering (ISSN: 2301-380X (Print)) Abstract and Index: Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, CNKI, etc.
